      "name": "Touch Events spec",
      "href": "https://www.w3.org/TR/2013/WD-touch-events-20130124/"

    "warnings": [
      "Indicates if the browser supports the Touch Events spec, and does not necessarily reflect a touchscreen device"
    ],
